title: LAK ZA LASE SOFT TOUCH CARE&HOLD, NIVEA, 250ML

instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Popršite po laseh z oddaljenosti približno 30 cm. Obrnite glavo navzdol in nanesite sprej še po spodnji strani las.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Alcohol Denat., Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Aqua, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Pantolactone, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Aminomethyl Propanol, Parfum
